description: Explore how VeeFriends is transforming open-source projects by integrating NFTs to foster community engagement and enhance project visibility. Founded by Gary Vaynerchuk, VeeFriends champions collaboration, innovation, and educational initiatives in the NFT space, redefining contributor engagement within open-source ecosystems.
keywords: VeeFriends, NFTs, open source, community engagement, technological innovation, Gary Vaynerchuk, project visibility, digital art, decentralization, collaboration, recognition, funding, educational initiatives, innovation
title: VeeFriends: Elevating Open Source with NFTs
